alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Yakutat; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 5:49PM AKST until March 02 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS FOR THE REST OF THE EVENING FOR MANY AREAS... A storm force low over northern gulf coast continues to send plently of moisture and wind into the panhandle today. Snowfall amounts of 6 to 18 inches have been reported over the northern inner channels and portions of the central inner channels Wednesday morning. Blizzard conditions have diminished at Juneau. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow showers continue. Additional snow accumulation of 2 to 5 inches expected through the evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Panhandle. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reported snow accumulations have ranged from around 8 to 17 inches across the area so far.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
